histogram.name: Geolocation.Android.LocationPermissionState
histogram.summary: Android location permission state, recorded when the geolocation permission context is initialized.

histogram.name: Geolocation.CoreLocationProvider.ErrorCode
histogram.summary: Records an enumeration value corresponding to the specific error encountered by the CoreLocationProvider while obtaining the device's location.

histogram.name: Geolocation.GeolocationImpl.ClientId
histogram.summary: Records an enumeration value when a GeolocationImpl requests the next location estimate. The recorded value identifies the client that created the GeolocationImpl.

histogram.name: Geolocation.IOS.ChangedAuthorizationState
histogram.summary: iOS location permission state, recorded when geolocation permission state changes while the app is running.

histogram.name: Geolocation.IOS.InitialAuthorizationState
histogram.summary: iOS location permission state, recorded at startup.

histogram.name: Geolocation.NetworkLocationRequest.Event
Geolocation.NetworkLocationRequest.RequestInterval
histogram.summary: For recording the time gap between each HTTP request to geolocation service. The maximum bucket is 10 minutes because that is the maxium interval between wifi data polls.

histogram.name: Geolocation.NetworkLocationRequest.ResponseCode
Geolocation.NetworkLocationRequest.Source
histogram.summary: Records an enumeration value when a network request has been sent to the network location service. The recorded value identifies the provider that initiated the request.

histogram.name: Geolocation.PublicIpAddressGeolocator.ClientId
histogram.summary: Records an enumeration value when a PublicIpAddressGeolocator requests the next location estimate. The recorded value identifies the client that created the PublicIpAddressGeolocator.

histogram.name: Geolocation.SystemGeolocationSourceWin.CheckAccessError
histogram.summary: Records the HRESULT error code encountered while checking location access status on Windows.

histogram.name: Geolocation.SystemGeolocationSourceWin.CreateAppCapabilityError
histogram.summary: Records the HRESULT error code encountered while creating the location app capability object on Windows.

histogram.name: Geolocation.SystemGeolocationSourceWin.InitialPermissionStatus
histogram.summary: Records an enumeration value representing the current system location permission state when SystemGeolocationSourceWin is initialized at browser startup on Windows.

histogram.name: Geolocation.SystemGeolocationSourceWin.LaunchSettingsResult
histogram.summary: Records the HRESULT error code encountered while launching the Windows settings page, or S_OK if the settings page was launched without errors.

histogram.name: Geolocation.SystemGeolocationSourceWin.PermissionStatusChanged
histogram.summary: Records an enumeration value representing the current system location permission state when SystemGeolocationSourceWin detects that the system location permission has changed state. Not recorded if the permission changed after showing the system permission prompt.

histogram.name: Geolocation.SystemGeolocationSourceWin.PermissionStatusChangedAfterPrompt
histogram.summary: Records an enumeration value representing the system location permission state following the first location permission state change after the Windows system permission prompt was shown.

histogram.name: Geolocation.SystemGeolocationSourceWin.RequestAccessResult
histogram.summary: Records the HRESULT error code encountered while requesting location access, or S_OK if location access was requested without errors.
